wikipedia_page.main:
Kenny Wilson (born 15 September 1946) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a forward.
His main achievement was in the 1971–72 season, when he played for the Dumbarton team that won the Second Division. He set the record for the most goals scored for Dumbarton in that season, scoring all the goals in a 5–0 victory over Raith Rovers.He now lives in Dumbarton.

response: Most goals in a season: Kenny Wilson (38), 1971–72
Ken, Kenneth or Kenny Wilson may refer to:
*Kenny Gasana (born 1984), American-born Rwandan basketball player, formerly known as Kenny Wilson
